content.question: Ralph is aware that smoking is harmful to his health, but he continues to smoke. According to cognitive dissonance theory, it is most likely that Ralph will

choices.label: gather information on the dangers of smoking
argue that his friends should stop smoking
focus on the social advantages to smoking

content.answer: focus on the social advantages to smoking

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
